item.title: Voxelcore Readme
item.description: Pipeline Figure 1. Pipeline. The program can be used to generate a voxelcore for either a given volume (representing a solid shape), or a triangular mesh (representing the surface of a shape) via voxelization. The pipeline is visualized in Figure 1. Preparing input Input of voxelcore program can be a binary volume (in format .mrc / .sog), or a triangular mesh representing the surface of a shape.
